name: Bluestar Linux 5
install_guide_markdown:
# Bluestar Linux Installation Guide

Bluestar uses Calamares with Arch's pacman for modern rolling release management.

install_steps.title: Download ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Get Bluestar 5 ISO from SourceForge or official mirrors.

install_steps.title: Create Bootable USB
install_steps.detail_md: Write ISO to USB (4GB+) using Etcher, Ventoy, or dd command.

install_steps.title: Boot and Select Environment
install_steps.detail_md: Boot from USB, choose desktop environment (KDE, GNOME, or Xfce).

install_steps.title: Run Calamares Installer
install_steps.detail_md: Partition disk, set timezone, create user account, and install.

install_steps.title: First Boot and Updates
install_steps.detail_md: Boot into system, update packages with pacman, customize as needed.

license: GPL and other open source licenses
privacy_notes: No telemetry. Full user control over system configuration.
